entry.title: To Be Loved is...
entry.summary:
Author: 1CORINTHIANS_134

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,396Chapters: 2/25Kudos: 1

Summary: Blood and metal clog his nose- mixing into a disgusting swarm of torment. Blue eyes are exhausted, and the mind is drawn to insanity; delirium.Everything and yet nothing consume his whole being, his soul and body- forcing turmoil, and an acknowledgement of those he wronged, but also fragmented pieces of memory, and framed scenarios of fake and filtered bloody spite. Actions can cause walls to break, but can also cause the breaking of a man in equivalent manner.Can a torn family, and guilt-ridden Bruce Wayne learn what it's like to be love and to love despite everything?For once in the Bat-family, a unity is made instead of division after grief-striking events.
